data.message: Love Eminem, love this song, but cutting off over one minute and a half of the music, making this shitty video, and promoting it as a short film in the director's twitter page, is beyond my understanding. Fuck you, Spike Lee!

replies.message: You do one better then give it to Eminem. Or just keep talkin
Lucas van ure missing the point dude!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I don't think the director did everything he could do with the story / song. He cutted off the best part of the track (the ending) and... if you're a fan there's a lot of this story that you already know, you come here for those missing pieces you need to see to understand this decision (eminem doing this song). I think the video lacks of the power that the song already has. I get you... Im not disappointed, because this song is epic, I love the album... but this video could have been better.
I'm also not impressed by the whole video,so many missing parts,spike fucked it up
not a big Spike Lee fan, so you know what to expect from him.
